content: knitted moon designs www knittedmoondesigns com mango market bag the scoop this bag is the one that can go with you everywhere www knittedmoondesigns com 1 quick and easy to crochet it can be made up in an evening and filled right away use it as a unique wrapping for a hostess gift with a bottle of wine and some napkins or fill it with baby items for an anticipated new arrival it can carry a load of groceries store vegetables outside the fridge hold the kids toys tote your beach stuff or hang in the shower to hold toiletries let your imagination loose as you find new uses for this durable and unique carry-all materials needed 500+ feet of doit mason twine or similar size i or smaller crochet hook stitch markers blunt tapestry needle for finishing instructions chain 4 leaving a long tail and join the chain into a ring by working a slip_stitch in the first chain round 1 chain 1 work 8 single_crochet into ring and working over loose end for a couple of stitches before starting round 2 make sure you have 8sc for round 1 round 2 *chain 1 place marker in the chain and single_crochet in the next single_crochet that would be the first single_crochet of round 1 continue in the round repeating from the * until you reach the marker helpful hint be sure to move the marker at the beginning of each round to keep your place round 3 *chain 2 move marker into the ch2 1 single_crochet in the ch1 space and repeat from * you will have 8 ch2 loops round 4 *chain 3 remember to move the marker 1 single_crochet in next ch2 space and repeat from * you will have 8 ch3 spaces round 5 * chain 3 single_crochet in the next chain 3 space twice and repeat from * you will have 16 chain 3 spaces be sure to count before moving the marker and starting round 6 rounds 6 7 and 8 *chain 3 1 single_crochet in next ch3 space and repeat from * you should have 16 loops round 9 *chain 4 1 single_crochet in next ch3 space and repeat from * www knittedmoondesigns com 2 round 10 * chain 5 1 single_crochet in the next ch4 space twice ch5 1 single_crochet in next ch5 space and repeat from * you will end up with 24 ch5 spaces round 11 *chain 5 1 single_crochet in next ch5 space and repeat from * rounds 12 13 and 14 work these rounds as in round 11 round 15 work this round as in round 10 you will end up with 36 ch5 spaces rounds 16-19 work as in round 11 round 20 *chain 4 1 single_crochet in next ch5 space and repeat from * round 21 *chain 3 1 single_crochet in the next ch4 space and repeat from * round 22 *chain 2 1 single_crochet in the next ch3 space and repeat from * round 23
